statement.p: Out of the last 41 days, it rained 8 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{8}}{{41}}={0.19512195121951}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.19512195121951}={19.512195121951} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 19.51 .
